text:
-ELECT
Station WHA-TV, Madison, Wis.
December 26, 1938
Mr. Duff Browne
Station WYES-TV
916 Navarre Avenue v
New Orleans 24, Louisiana
Dear Duff: *
I have just learned of your election as Director of Region
V and I want to extend my congratulations and welcome you to the
NAEB Board of Directors.
Certainly with all the new and warmed-over blood that lias
been injected into the NAEB administration, no one can now charge
(as Schwarzwalder once did) that NAEB is nothing but a closed
club run by a bunch of superannuated radio men. With you, McBride,
Eager, Schwarzwalder and myself there is a good deal of TV manageÂ¬
ment represented on the Board; and, of course, Sehooley, Miles,
and Ausmus are very much involved in television, too. Your election
to the NAEB Board also provides another link to the Center via your
membership on the fund raising subcommittee of the Affiliates.
So I am sure you will add strength to our Board and I look
forward to working with you in the Interests of NAEB,
Best wishes for the holiday season.
Cordially yours.
William G. Harley
WGH:jc
